1970 agawana wita samagi peramunu aanduwa jawipe kerehi wishesha awadhanayakin sitina athara 1970 agosthu 09 dina samagi peramunu aanduwe lekamwaru thidena jawipe mardanaya kirima sadaha janatha sahaya pathana ladi. 1970 agosthu 12 aarakshaka lekam rathnawel mahatha wisin wishesha prakashayak karamin che wyapara aanduwe anka eke sathura bawath eya mulinuputa damiya yuthu bawath prakasha karayi. 1971marthu 06 wana dina eewana witath jawipen wenwa siti dharmasekara kandayama wisin amarikanu thanapathi karyalayata paharadena ladi.

enam soli aakramana nisa anuradhapura rajadhaniya polonnaruwata maruwuweda ekoloswana siyawasediya, rajadhani samibandhayen sidu wu mema wenaskamath samagama aagamika wishwasa samibandhayenda wenaskamak athi wiya, ee wana wita lakdiwa thibu pujaniya wasthun yugalayen ekak wu jaya shri maha bodhin wahanse anurapura rajadhaniyema wada sitimata salaswa dalada wahansege ayithiya thaman wetha pawaragena eya rajadhani wenaswana wita ee ee rajadhani wetha wadama karawimata katayuthu kalaha, ese karana ladde dalada wahanse palakayan wisin rajyathwaye sankethaya washayen salakagenaya, anuradhapura yugaye awasana kalaye enam hatharawana udaya ( kri,wa. 946 -954 ) rajuge kalayedi athi wu chola aakramanaya nisa dalada wahanse anuradhapurayen pitathata wadamawa athi athara hathara wana mihidu rajuge ( kri,wa. 956 -972 ) kalayema nawatha dalada wahanse aapasu anuradhapurayata wadama wu bawa sadahan we, eheth mebandak mahawanshaya thula sadahan nowe, kese wethath kri,wa 1017 -1070 dakwa polonnaruwei pawathi chola palana samaya thula dalada wahanse pilibada thorathuru pradhana wanshakathawala sadahan nowe, namuth asgiri thalpatha adhyanaya kala mandis rohanadhirayan pawasanne ekala chola balapama nisa burumayata gos siti sinhala bhikshun wahansela dalada wahanse aaraksha kala bawayi. 58 paswana mihidu raju solinge sirakaruwaku bawata path wime sita 1wana wijayabahu rajathuma rajawana kalaya athara thura rate pawathi ayahapath wathawaranaya hethuwen bhikshun da sasunada pirihuna heyin wijayabahu rajuta nawatha shasana prathishtapanayak kirimata siduwu bawa pahadiliya.
ee mohothedi ma pasukaramin hitiyeda rabar wathu ha badawati sahitha lassana parisarayak.

indiya saga­raya yanu ‘ana­ga­thaye saga­raya’ yayi awa­dha­ra­naya kala shri lanka agra­ma­thya­wa­raya, saga­raya aashritha rata­wala shishta­chara osse mathu­wana sanskru­thin, yatath wijitha krama­weda, jathya­nthara prami­thin ha sara­dharma samaga sasa­ndena sirith wirith ha wati­na­kam aadi­yen indiya sagara kala­paya posha­naya wi athi bawath prakasha kaleya.

tharuna kalayema deshapalanaya sambandha wu meshal 1987 di hamas sanwidhanaya pihitawanu labu dina sita ehi samajikayeku lesa katayuthu karayi. 1991 galf yuddhaya wenathuru kuwetaye randi siti meshal, inikbithi jordanayata giyeya. 1997 wasaredi ohu ghathanaya kirimata eesh rayalaye mosad rahas oththu sewaya wisin karana lada uthsahayakin ohu galawune jordanaye husen rajuge madihath wimeni. 1999 wasaredi, husen rajuge abhawayen pasu sihasunata path dewana abdulla raju hamas sanwidhanaya thahanam kala athara, meshal eratin pitawa katarayata paminiyeya. 2001 sita dashakayaka kalayak meshal jiwath wuye siriyaweya. 2011 wasaredi siriyanu rajaya wiwechanaya karamin ohu eratin pitawa aaweya.

mobitel samagamata ayath depala ha dijital pa්radarshana thira mahindage pa්racharaka danwim sandaha labadima ganada, mahinda rajapakshage katawut gasima sandaha kuma stikars namathi aayathanayata mobitel samagamen mudal gewima ganada rubasinhata erehiwa chodana weyi.
piwithuru hela urumaye nayaka parlimenthu mantha්ri udaya gammanpila mahatha ema paksha mulasthanaye pawathi madhya hamuwak amathamin mese adahas pala kaleya.
emenma karyalayata deshiya saha wideshiyawa aramudal upaya ras kirimata da balaya thibena bawin thaman ras karana thorathuru wideshiya buddhi ansha walata menma bedumwadinta da wikiniya haka.
